We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private SwissArmyKnife _swiss;
// In Initialize()
_swiss = SWISS(symbol, period, delta, tool);

// In OnData()
if (_swiss.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Is Ready", _swiss.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Warm Up Period", _swiss.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Current", _swiss.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Name", _swiss.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Samples", _swiss.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.swiss = self.SWISS(symbol, period, delta, tool)

# In OnData()
if self.swiss.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Is Ready", self.swiss.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Warm Up Period", self.swiss.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Current", self.swiss.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Name", self.swiss.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Samples", self.swiss.Samples);
}
